item.title: Request: Teleport Emotes

item.description:
@xerozcheez wrote:

[quote=“RS-ixteen, post:3, topic:1131”]Emotes are just a waste of space and Pc memory

WHY WOULD YOU NEED IT

ppf i can see now why there is so much lag

USELESS THIS WE DONT NEED![/quote]

Rofl are you insane? Speaking in caps like it’s something really bad, it may lag you but if you have a fairly decent pc it’ll be fine…-.- that’s why runescape has low memory requirements.

item.title: Request: Teleport Emotes
item.dc:creator: @ZhaR ZhaR
item.description:
@ZhaR wrote:

Teleporting Out Emote is: 714
Teleporting In Emote is: 715

Someone please modify this code, or any code so that when someone teleports, it shows the emote, then teles.

TeleToAdvanced(“Varrock”, 25);
pEmote = 714;
break;
case 4143:
TeleToAdvanced(“Lumby”, 31);
break;
case 4146:
TeleToAdvanced(“Falador”, 37);
break;
case 4150:
TeleToAdvanced(“Camelot”, 45);
break;
case 6004:
TeleToAdvanced(“Ardy”, 51);
break;
case 6005:
TeleToAdvanced(“WTower”, 58);
break;
case 29031:
TeleToAdvanced(“THeim”, 61);
break;
case 72038:
TeleToAdvanced(“AAtoll”, 64);
break;

Read full topic
